replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot and info, though sorry it's been happening out of the blue.  Your connection, specifically to the game server, seems to have become unstable somehow.  I suggest sticking to custom games for now to troubleshoot through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Make sure to go over each step, and you should be all set.
